content: Nifty 50 at 24,860: Banking sector leading gains with HDFC Bank +2.1%, ICICI +1.8%. IT sector showing recovery signs. Key resistance at 25,000.
Weekly Options Strategy: Nifty trading near 24,860. Consider 24,800 PE and 25,000 CE for range-bound market. Max profit zone: 24,800-25,000.
Focus on quality mid-caps as Q3 earnings approach. IT sector revival, pharma for defense, infrastructure for growth. Maintain 60:30:10 equity-debt-gold allocation.
